---
title: "Schedule/Progam"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| 
agenda <- data.frame(
    "9 - 11" = c("Opening ceremony and launching of phase 2", "Inclusivity and equity section", "SMall outbreaks", "Designing outbreak analytics course", "Presentation of packages and challenges"),
    "11 - 11:30" = rep("Tea break", 5),
    "11:30 - 13" = c("Phase 2 implementation planning", "Reflecting on lessons learned", "Gaps/needs", "One health", "Tools for surveillance"),
    "13 - 15" = rep("lunch", 5),
    "15 - 17" = c("RSE session", "RSE session", "site seeing", "RSE session", ""))
rownames(agenda) <- c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday")
names(agenda) <- c("9 - 11", "11 - 11:30", "11:30 - 13", "13 - 15", "15 - 17")

agenda |>
kableExtra::kbl() |>
  kableExtra::kable_paper("striped", font_size = 14, full_width = TRUE) #|>
  # kableExtra::scroll_box(height = "200px", width = "100%",
  #                        box_css = "border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 5px; ",
  #                        extra_css = NULL,
  #                        fixed_thead = TRUE)
```

|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|
| Monday    | Opening ceremony and launching of Phase 2 | Tea break  | Phase 2 implementation planning | lunch   | RSE session                       |
| Tuesday   | Reflecting on lessons learned             | Tea break  | Gaps/needs                      | lunch   | RSE session                       |
| Wednesday | Neglected tropical diseases               | Tea break  | One health                      | lunch   | site seeing                       |
| Thursday  | Designing outbreak analytics course       | Tea break  | Tools for surveillance          | lunch   | Q&A between RSEs and Data.org/PIs |
